adDetails: We are family-friendly, renting out clean jumpers for parties of any occasion! No need to worry about set up - we'll deliver, set up with the blower in any weather, and pick up the jumper at any time. Contact us for the customer satisfaction you deserve. Habalmos espanol. * Jumper rentals are $100 for the whole day, flat rate. * TIGGER WINNIE THE POOH BOUNCE HOUSE -13 feet by 13 feet -flat surface to roam around -Recommended for all ages, big or small SUPER SLIDE BOUNCE HOUSE -13 feet by 11 feet -climbing wall, slide -Recommended mainly for smaller children If interested, please contact Armand at show contact info. Thank you.
